name: M. v. S.
description:
We're Team 23 (name a WIP 😅) and are making M.v.S. as our Senior Capstone for University of California, Santa Cruz's Art & Design: Games and Playable Media and Computer Science: Game Design majors. Check out our progress as we develop this game!
